name: Byte Ground
description:
A TERRIFIC GAME OF IT AGILITY, AGILE, DEVOPS AND INTELLIGENT COMPUTING! Wish to know, want to experience how IT (information technology) pipelines are executed, improved and made self-sustaining? PLAY IT!

Be the IT LEAD, be the DEVELOPER, be the APPLICATION TESTER, be the IT OPERATIONS GUY - managing infrastructure, managing application releases and handling failures and service requests in production. PLAY THE ROLES!

EARN REVENUE, CONTROL COSTS, ENSURE SECURITY, MAKE YOUR TEAM AND TECHNOLOGIES RESILIENT TO FAILURES, AND JUMP TO NEW CHALLENGING LEVELS! All while having FUN!

At the end - be the WORKHORSE whom your organization believes in, the ROCKSTAR whom they bank upon, OR THE YOGI - THE GURU - who attains the IT NIRVANA!

Get you teams to indulge, play and have fun!
